All Classes

Class Description
ClientHandler
this class represents server's client Handler
ClientRequest
this class represents a ClientRequest
Connector
this class connect a client request to server
Executor
this class is a executor which executes list of clientRequest in different Threads.
ExtraData
this class built for storing some extraData which a clientRequest doesn't need for send and just GUI needs them, or may be in future will use it
FollowRedirectException
this exception occurs when response code is 3** (redirection)
HttpConnection
this class represents a HttpConnector for connecting to server , read or write on it
Main
start server
RequestsStorage
this class stores list of client requests of program
RequestType
this enum has variety of requests type
ResponseStorage
this class represents a storage which holds responses for owner clientRequest
Server
this class represents the Server
ViewServer
this class created for showing on GUI
